title: Without Flaws
description: Zach has been trapped in a torture facility since he was a child and his father abandoned him there. But when he notices that his mom is close to her breaking point, he realizes it's time to plan a daring escape. A bizarre bond with a strange girl from the outside world might be the key he needs to escape. Zara is a mutant with the ability to look into the future. One day has a grave vision where she loses everything, but she can't remember the vision. Will she be able to connect the dots and save everyone? Or will everything and everyone she has ever cared for be taken away from her?
author: Diane Asther
